description: A representation of a logical grouping of personnel resources, equipment resources, physical asset resources, and material that is committed, available, or unavailable for a given process segment for a specific time shall be presented as a process segment capability.
title: Process segment capability
$comment: According to ANSI/ISA-95.00.02-2018 Enterprise-Control System Integration âˆ’ Part 2: Objects and Attributes for - Approved 24 May 2018

links.dtdl:description: The process segment related to this process segment capability.
The nested process segment capability(s) makes up part of this process segment capability as the whole.
The personnel capability(s) related to this process segment capability.
The equipment capability(s) related to this process segment capability.
The physical asset capability(s) related to this process segment capability.
The material capability(s) related to this process segment capability.

links.x-jsonschema:$comment: Not part of the Standard Specs.

operationsType.title: Operations type
operationsType.description: Describes the category of the activity
operationsType.comment: Required attribute. Possible values are: production, maintenance, quality, inventory, or mixed

oneOf.title: Mixed
oneOf.$comment: can be used when the activity contains several categories of process segments
: capacity that is committed for future productive use.
capacity that is not attainable for future productive use given the equipment condition, equipment utilization, personnel availability or material availability.
capacity that is available for additional future productive use.
a historical value that defines the portion of the capacity with acceptable quality.
a historical value that defines the portion of the capacity that was not used or had unacceptable quality.
the sum of used and unused capability or the sum of available, unattainable and committed capability.

reason.title: Reason
reason.description: Defines the reason for the capability type.

confidenceFactor.title: Confidence Factor
confidenceFactor.description: Measure of the confidence of the ability to obtain the capacity value.

startTime.title: Start Time
startTime.description: The starting time of this capability type.

endTime.title: End Time
endTime.description: The ending time of this capability type.

hierarchyScope.title: Hierarchy scope
hierarchyScope.description: Identifies where the exchanged information fits within the role based equipment hierarchy.
